334.1:
Submarine U-511 of the German Navy, please call me Yuu.
I've come a long way, so I'll be in your care...
334.25:
I'm the... German Navy U-Boat, U-511.
I worked hard to come here.
If I could be friends... with everyone... and get acquainted with this place's culture... I think that'd be nice.
334.3: I know. That's the greeting in this fleet right? It's different.
334.4: "When in Rome, do as the Romans do" they said... Well, wonder what should I do.
